message.body: You're getting a tattoo?! ...it's not of Olivia Munn, is it?
Haha no but... And please dont judge but it actually has a line from newsroom... I know i know

Are you on a mission to civilize? ;-) Just be careful with writing, it's really, really hard to do well. I'm sure you're going to someone good though :-) I will look forward to welcoming you to the inked club!
(1/2)No but that was a greta line as well. I don't want to spoil it, but you'll recognize it right away. It's corny but I really liked it. As far the skill
(2/2)level... I guess we'll wait and see. Fingers crossed :)

Let me know how it goes! If you need backup, I can call the crazy (but crazily talented) Russian artist at my shop. he's done so much work for my sister & her husband that he came to their wedding, I kid you not. Anyway, good luck! I'm really excited for you :-)
no more crazy russians dammit :) I'll let you know how it goes and if I need someone to hold my hand when I go bac kto get it colored
Deal. I even promise not to laugh if the pain bothers you. But I'm sure you'll be fine. In my experience it's really not bad at all. And totally worth it!
